mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tucao_count AS "tucaoCount", a.content AS "content", a.status AS "status", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.tucao_count AS "hotCount", a.content AS "content", a.status AS "status", IF(b.id IS NULL , 0, 1) AS "likeFlag" FROM bpl_hot a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM bpl_like WHERE userId = #{userId}) b ON a.id = b.hotId;
mapper.update: UPDATE bpl_hot SET tucao_count = tucao_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{hotId}
